meanings.definition: The opening of a goal in soccer or hockey where the ball or puck enters.
meanings.sent1: The soccer player kicked the ball into the goalmouth.
meanings.sent2: The goalie blocked the shot aimed at the goalmouth.

meanings.definition: The area in front of a goal where scoring opportunities occur.
meanings.sent1: The striker positioned himself perfectly in the goalmouth to score.
meanings.sent2: The defenders crowded the goalmouth to prevent any shots.
meanings.sent3: The goalmouth was a battlefield of players fighting for the ball.
